text: I see the naked body of a girl on the street. For a moment, I suppose what would happen if it were me. But, at ten steps, she finds a man who I see as her husband or her lover. A romantic would make this a tragedy; an outsider would see it as a comedy. I, however, mix the two, for I am romantic in myself and strange to myself, and turn the page to another irony. FIN
title: Destino
author: Fernando Pessoa
